hero.slogan: Fragancao – Innovating the way the world experiences scent

whatIsIt.title: One spray, endless experience.
whatIsIt.paragraph1: The Perfume Vending Machine is a stylish addition to any location. Visitors select their favorite fragrance with a single touch and instantly enjoy a short, refreshing spray, a small experience that feels grand.
whatIsIt.paragraph2: The device is fully automatic and contactless, specially developed for high-traffic areas such as clubs, hotels, gyms, and airports.
whatIsIt.paragraph3: Each machine contains up to five carefully selected perfumes, tailored to different styles and target audiences.
whatIsIt.paragraph4: This way, you offer your guests something extra: a moment of refreshment, a smile, a memory, while simultaneously creating a new source of revenue, without effort or maintenance.
whatIsIt.mobile_paragraph: The Perfume Vending Machine is a stylish, automatic solution for high-traffic locations. Visitors choose from five premium fragrances with a single touch and instantly receive a refreshing spray. A brief experience that stands out, adds value for your guests, and effortlessly generates extra revenue.

step2.description: Pay quickly and securely with your bank card or smartphone

step4.title: Continue your day
step4.description: Experience the luxury of a signature scent, wherever you are

specs.title: Designed to be remembered
specs.step1_desc: The machine supports up to 5 different fragrances, each with a 50ml refillable container. Ideal for offering multiple scent options in one device.
specs.step2_desc: Equipped with a 10.1-inch touchscreen for easy navigation and fragrance selection. Sleek, responsive and intuitive for users.
specs.step3_desc: Integrated card payment module supports contactless payments via card, phone, or smartwatch. Fast, secure and fully automated.
specs.step4_desc: Operates via Wi-Fi or 4G LTE, allowing real-time monitoring of usage, sales, and refill levels. Easy to manage from anywhere.
specs.step5_desc: Compact and elegant, designed to save space and blend seamlessly into modern interiors. Perfect for hotels, clubs, airports, and public restrooms.
